Articles.Content:
oh. My apologies. I did not realize my senses were wrong. We good? *hugs*

uh...er...um....Assuming that not cheating is also being fair? Cheater! One can definitly be unfair without cheating, my friend.
Too much philosophy is cheating!! Cheater!!
Big words! Big words! Cheater!
Why are you using a real name as a username on the internet? Is it because you're a CHEATER?!
Being a Jedi Master? Cheating. Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.

No one is online that often,

unless of course they are cheaters!
You completed the k-prize? Cheater! Nobody can complete the K-prize! Unless they're cheaters like you!
What?! The OP playing his own game?! Why, you CHEATER!!!111!!1!!ONE
Posting a reply with malfunctioning 1 and/or Shift key is cheating you know.

Saying that some one is a cheater is cheating! CHEATER!!!

(Wait.. i just... *Universe explodes*)
A paradoxical accusation? Here, have some sugar for your hot cup of cheating. Good cheating accusations are logically sound.

But...your accusation implies that one can put cheating in a cup...and that is definitely not logically sound. Cheater! For breaking your own rules! Good and honest non-cheaters never break their own rules!
Talking about cheating? Cheater!
talking about people talking CHEATER!
A sentence that makes no sense....I suspect cheating. Most, and i say most so as to not be accused of generalizing everyone, non cheaters only talk in sentences that make total sense.
Making sense? That's easy mode, cheater. Real players always cold monster pantaloons.
What is this using codes to give your self a booster, cheater!
I have no idea what that was supposed to mean... But I suspect cheating was involved! Non cheaters never cheat! (Obviously)
Starting a thread??? O.O How can anybody start their own thread?! Obvious cheating.
not obvious to the last post well then this cheating if you don't know.
Cheater because you made an empire behind a republic

Claiming you aren't rude? Ack! I can't breathe! The cheating is clogging my lungs! Someone call a doctor! All non cheating non people chokers never claim they aren't rude, but accept that people will think whatever people will think.
cheater because your trying to make some believe your not also part of t'his'story
Making your own parts for KSP? Only a remorseless cheater would even think to do that. Real players use the parts Squad gave them.
I bet you only play sandbox mode with those stock parts, you CHEATER!
